full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI 'PHRIN LAS BZHI'I SBYIN SREG DNGOS GRUB KYI RGYA MTSO BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @028A *, ,(ZHES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI 'PHRIN LAS BZHI'I SBYIN SREG DNGOS GRUB KYI RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DON GNYER CAN MANG PO LA PHAN PAR MTHONG NAS, ,DON YOD RDO RJE CHUNG BA'I SBYIN SREG GNYIS LA YID GTAN MI RUNG BA MANG DU SNANG BAS BTANG SNYOMS SU BZHAG CING, ,RTOG 'DUN GYI 'GREL PA GNYIS SU DGRA NAG DANG DE'I SBYIN SREG DPAL 'DZIN GYIS MDZAD PA BZHIN MDOR BSDUS BSHAD PA LEGS PAR MTHONG NAS, ,DGRA NAG DANG DPAL 'DZIN GYI SBYIN SREG LA GZHI BYAS SBYIN SREG THAMS CAD KYI SPYI'I CHO GA 'OD KYI SNYE MAS KHA BSKANGS SHING GZHUNG GZHAN RNAMS NAS KYANG CUNG ZAD BLANGS TE, GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYIS 'O DE GUNG RGYAL GYI LHA ZHOL BYAMS PA GLING DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
